thread.title: Arrest Warrants Issued for Financiers Who Allegedly Used Insurer for Personal Gain

author: Leslie Scism
title: Arrest Warrants Issued for Financiers Who Allegedly Used Insurer for Personal Gain
text:
Oklahoma authorities filed arrest warrants for two New York financiers, alleging they took control of a local insurer using millions of dollars of counterfeit assets, state court filings show.
The insurer, Red Rock Insurance Co., failed in 2014 and state insurance regulators have claimed that the financiersâ€™ strategy led to a loss of more than $23 million.
